message.content:
cs.GT, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a framework for designing mechanisms that incentivize truth-telling in situations where information cannot be verified. This falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT) and information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the use of machine learning techniques (cs.AI) and statistical methods (cs.DS) in designing and analyzing the mechanisms. Finally, the paper provides a theoretical understanding of existing mechanisms, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG).
